title: CadEval Task Definition
description: Schema for validating task definition YAML files in the CadEval project.

task_id.description: Unique identifier for the task (e.g., snake_case_description).

description.description: Natural language prompt for the LLM.

reference_stl.description: Relative path to the reference ground truth STL file.

requirements.description: Specific criteria for evaluating the generated model.

bounding_box.description: Target dimensions [Length, Width, Height] in millimeters (mm).

topology_requirements.description: Specifies requirements related to the model's structure.

expected_component_count.description: The number of distinct solid bodies expected (usually 1 for single parts).
